Package com.kneelawk.knet.api.util

Class NetBuf.SavedReaderIndex

java.lang.Object
com.kneelawk.knet.api.util.NetBuf.SavedReaderIndex
Enclosing interface:
NetBuf<B extends net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf & NetBuf<? super B>>
public static final class NetBuf.SavedReaderIndex extends Object
Holds an index into a NetByteBuf that can be restored.
